Description: Two recessed wooden writing-boards perforated with two holes along each joing edge; Greek school text (epigram, riddle) incised into layer of wax; iron stylus attached to signet-ring.
Curator's comments: P.Lond.Lit. 63; TM 63841; Mertens-Pack 01765.000; T.BM 29527 Cribiore 1996: no. 202; Milne (P.Lond.Lit.) 63; Diels 1898: 857-858; Guichard 2007: 228-229; Cauderlier 1992: 90, no. 275; De Marco 2009: 84-86; Pack 1965: 1765; Zalateo `961: 68; Debut 1986: 182.
Bibliographic references: Cribiore 1996 / Writing, teachers, and students on Graeco-Roman Egypt (no. 202)
